title: Intermodal – Chicago, IL
job_details:
Experience Requirements: 6 months
Required Endorsements/Certificates: None
Specialized Equipment: None
Home Time: Daily
Shift: Night
Weekend Work: Yes
Holiday Work Expectations: If scheduled day
Pertinent Lane Information: Runs Chicago, Wisconsin, Michigan, Iowa, and Indiana
Favorable Lane Information: Home daily; drop and hook heavy; no touch freight; night shift 7 PM–4 AM (Mon–Fri); weekend hours Sat 12 AM–Mon 4 AM; stop pay (Spiff Pay) applies only if load is routed 3 loaded miles; night differential $0.06 CPM; weekend differential $0.12 CPM
Unfavorable Lane Information: Chicago traffic and out-of-state runs (still home daily)
Average Earnings per Week: $1,200
Pay / Compensation Package: $0.62 CPM + $20 load pay per load; night and weekend differentials apply
Weekly Mileage: 1,800
Bonus Offer: No bonus offer
Transition Bonus: No
Stop Pay: No stop pay
Unload Pay: No

Once a driver learns the account, the ideal shift is 400+ miles a shift. expect to work 10-12 hrs per shift

title: Walmart Gordonsville, VA
job_details:
Freight: A mixture of dry and refrigerated no-touch, live unload grocery freight to Walmart store locations in VA, NC, MD, PA, and WV.
Shifts: Start times between noon and midnight, with weekends required. Work 5 days on, 2 days off, with more shifts becoming available upon increased tenure at account.
Routes: Drivers can expect to run approximately 1600-1700 miles per week. This will usually require 2 routes per working day (11–14 hour shift)
Key Requirements
Schedule: Afternoons, nights, weekends, and holidays based on your schedule.
Home Time: Home Daily. Drivers will receive consistent home time with 48-hour resets (same two days off every week).
Equipment: Slip-seat operation in newer model day cabs.
Customer Service: Must prioritize safety, have exceptional customer service skills, and handle customer concerns with patience.
Vacation Eligibility: 1 week after 1 year, 2 weeks after 2 years, 3 weeks after 7 years, and 4 weeks after 10 years.
Benefits
Home Daily: Local routes allow drivers to be home daily with consistent schedules.
Industry-Leading Pay Package: Top-performing drivers can earn over $1500 per week.
Stop Pay: $20 per stop
Minimum Mileage Pay: Shorter Routes will be paid out on Minimum pay band scale.
Support: Tenured 24/7 operations staff and shop support for drivers.
Part-Time Option: Part-time drivers can work 11–29 hours per week, with flexibility to choose shifts Friday through Sunday nights.
Pay Structure
Average Weekly Pay: Drivers working 5 on and 2 off with 1600 miles per week can expect approximately $1300 per week (after a 90-day ramp-up period with no attendance issues).
Top Pay: Top-performing drivers can earn over $1500 per week.

title: Meijer Tipp City, OH
job_details:
Meijer Dedicated – Home Daily – Tipp City, OH (ZIP 45371). Drivers must live within 50 miles of the distribution center. Home daily with 2 days off per week.
Overview

Dedicated Meijer account offering consistent home-daily routes with steady freight and reliable pay.
Account operates 24/7 with varying start times. Shifts available based on current openings.
Routes serve Meijer locations in OH, KY, and IN within a 250-mile radius.
Support provided by 24/7 on-site staff at the distribution center.
Description

This position provides competitive pay, consistent schedules, and flexibility for both full-time and part-time drivers.
Drivers run dry and refrigerated no-touch freight, including live unloads and drop & hook.
Slip-seat operation using newer model day cab trucks.
Assigned tractors are provided on an as-needed basis.
Restrictions

Must live within 50 miles of Tipp City, OH (ZIP 45371).
Must have personal transportation to and from the distribution center daily.
Nights, weekends, and holidays are required.
Working the week before a holiday is mandatory.
Job Details

Home Time: Home daily with 2 days off per week.
Schedule: 24/7 account with variable start times.
Freight: Dry and refrigerated no-touch freight.
Operating Area: OH, KY, IN.
Shift Length: Average 12-hour shifts.
Training Pay: $100 per day for 1-day ride-along training.
Key Requirements

Must be available for night shifts, weekends, and holidays.
Holiday Pay: $75 for working on a holiday.
Vacation: 1 week after 1 year, 2 weeks after 3 years, paid based on a 52-week average.
Benefits

Home Daily: Consistent routes allow drivers to return home every day.
On-Site Support: 24/7 staff available at the distribution center.
Paid Vacation: Begins after 1 year of service.
Flexible Part-Time Option: Part-time drivers may work 8–36 hours per week (no vacation pay).
Pay Structure

Average Weekly Pay: $1,350, with potential to earn more based on miles and stops.
Backhaul Pay: $51.50 per backhaul.
Stop Pay: $20.00 per stop after the first stop.
Minimum Pay: $45 for routes under 96 miles.
